name: Fun Soaps
description: These embedded soaps are the best way to encourage kids to take baths. Each soap contains glycerin and essenial oils. The soap comes in a clear base to allow for all of the characters inside the soap to shine through. All embeds consist of soap, except for the toys. GET CLEAN AND HAVE FUN AT THE SAME TIME.

name: Mommy Soaps
description: When the kids go to bed mommy needs to pamper herself and with my all natural handmad soaps you can do that. Soaps come in clear, white or oatmeal. You can have flowers added for fragrance like lillys or roses, or you could just have an oil like lavender or chamomile added for aroma. All of it is relaxing, and MOMA NEEDS A BREAK TOO. All soaps are made with all natural glycerine.

name: Soothing Bath Gels
description: This shower gel is made from the same natural ingredients as the bar soap. You can use this gel in the Shower, or Bath, it's your choice. It comes in clear, white and oatmeal. LIVE THE LIFE AND INDULGE. The bottles come in 6 oz sizes.

name: Healing Bath Salts
description: Bath Salts are very healing and full of natural exfoliants. Enjoy the natural bath salts that I create with my own two hands. They come in  6oz packages. They also come in choices of lavender, jasmine, rosewood, and chamomile aromas.

name: Poochy Mats
description: These mats are handmade and weaved with the softest yarn. The dimensions are: 26"x 17" approximately. They are great for any pet. Show your pets how much you love them, give them softness to lie on. The name of the pet can be painted onto the corner edge of the mat, if so requested.
